description: Try our easy to follow Squid Puttanesca Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Squid Puttanesca Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 540 g arrabiata thick & chunky pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook fettucine following packet directions. Drain the pasta and return to the pan. Add the sauce and toss to combine. Serve.
